_header: Tway emperors in some time was in the land of Rome
Subjects: Simplice and Faustine, saints, lives of; saints’ lives
_description: Lives of SS. Simplice and Faustine, in one MS of the South English Legendary

Bod779.First Lines:
Twey emperourus in som tyme was in þe lond of romeþat
                    slouin many a cristinman þorw wel wilfuldome…
Bod779.Last Lines:
…& bringe vs to þe ioye þer þat hy beþ
                    inne& þat we mote oure ryȝt eritage wit ryȝt to oure
                    soulus awinne
Bod779.Editions:
Horstmann,  Carl. 
             “Des Ms. Bodl. 779 jüngere Zusatzlegenden zur südlichen
                Legendensammlung.” 
             Archiv für das Studium der neueren Sprachen und
                Literaturen
         82 (1889): 307-422: 414-16.
